https://tmrev.io/movie/223706-Boy & the World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hgnoNfQsVJyzKY1qI8VbjsH2FwP.jpg Suffering because of his father's departure to the big city, a boy leaves his village and discovers a fantastic world dominated by bug-engines and strange beings. An unusual animation with various artistic techniques that portrays the issues of the modern world through the eyes of a child. Boy & the World
